attributes.action: make it illegal to have a child without first obtaining a licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You have to get a licence to own a dog, but anyone can have a child and potentially subject it to a life of abuse and torture. I propose that everyone should have to apply for a licence to have a child, and be subject to the same extensive checks as adoptive parents are.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
